website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight materials in a suspension training kit. Carry the gear anywhere and start exercising.
pros: Easy to set up and use indoors or outdoors
Includes a suspension anchor for outdoor workouts
Has plenty of information to help beginners start using the gear immediately
cons: Costs a little more than some other options
Doesn't have the same level of materials as some higher-priced models

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, light suspension trainer. Beware, not as strong as other options.
customer_reviews.text: Super light yet super strong. Highly recommended for the price. These are about half the width of the basic trainer and pro. *Update! I have had this band for 2.5 months now and the seams are beginning to tear. Specifically, the ones for the yell tabs you use to shorten the trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zurita

customer_reviews.title: At first I was disappointed because it had smaller straps and the adjustment system ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a TRX and ordered this as a second so that my wife could work out with me. At first I was disappointed because it had smaller straps and the adjustment system was slightly different, not as robust. Yet, this is exactly what she needed. It's lighter weight, excellent for those days when she travels, and ended up feeling like a 'His and Hers' pairing. I don't want this to sound like it wouldn't work for a big guy like myself - you could tow a small trailer with it. All-in-all, it's TRX quality through and through. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperping

customer_reviews.title: Poor design - buy the sturdier one
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Straps slip when you're doing full body weight. Don't bother with this version - if you don't want to end up on ground buy the full size version.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for home use with a ceiling mount (rather than for portable travel use). It is just as hoped -- although somewhat lighter weight than the equipment in the gym at work, this is completely adequate for me to use confidently. (I am over 6' tall, over 210 pounds.)
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Great for those on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Ropes appear to be a little slimmer than the gym version but all connections are secure. Foam handles are fine and everything rolls up into like an 8" bag. Super portable and great for people on the go who like to work out but can't trust fitness centers in hotels. The kit comes with setup instructions and a couple basic workouts. Only downside to this product is that the TRX app SUCKS! It turns off your music and resets your workout if you switch apps. Recommend you look up different exercises and set your own routine.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter who has special needs put this up by herself and I checked it out. It is sturdy and goes securely on her bedroom door. The chart that comes with it is helpful and my daughter uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen S

customer_reviews.title: Strap slips - very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Update - They processed the return quickly so I raised the rating. I bought the more expensive version, will see how that goes I can't believe they can't make the straps lock in place for $130. That is dangerous and downright insulting. What junk. Now I have to drive around town to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Very small difference from non- portable version. In fact i like these better... I Suggest buying a monting bracket for indoor, more permanent placement.
customer_reviews.author: Responsible Reviewer 412

customer_reviews.title: No instructions on how to use the anchors
customer_reviews.text: There were no clear instructions or examples of how to hook the system up to the anchors. I get how to use the door anchor but how do I use the outdoor anchor? Can’t they show examples? The fold out card pretty much just said, hang it up and go, here’s some exercises you can do. It’s not all that intuitive to me and I don’t want to assume how to anchor this because I could turn out to be wrong and injure myself.
customer_reviews.author: Slumberingdragon

customer_reviews.title: Work Out with a Tree
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system about a year ago. Watched videos. Tried some of the routines. This year on my travels, I set up my TRX in this beautiful garden supported by a tree. For some reason I was able to make up my own routine from the other work outs I had been doing with my personal trainer and it made all the difference. This basic model is all you need if you want to take a system on the road. When I go home, I plan to look for a tree I can work out with because working out in the fresh air was so much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Been using this at the gym and just saw that ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this at the gym and just saw that you can get a lightweight travel version. There's a small square "packet" that you throw over the door (closest to the hinge), close the door, hook up the straps, and it's ready to go! I used it to work today and am taking it on vacation tomorrow. It also comes with a book of exercises. Wish I'd gotten this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Straps slip all the time
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the same quality you see in a gym. And the straps slip when I use about 60% of my body weight. They don't work if they slip all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: serial# will not register
customer_reviews.text: The serial # will not register, the -contact us- page on their website "404 page not found" Finally found a number to call and had to leave a message because nobody answered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Full Body Workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought his after using a friend’s TRX. It truly is a full body workout and I love that it uses your own body weight to get you really working. The only reason I docked 1 star is because where it clips to either the overhang for door or adjustable strap, the metal clasp bangs off the door when I use it. It worries me that it’s going to scratch the paint right off the door. I wrap it with a dish cloth when I use it at home, but I wish the metal clasp wasn’t exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Lighweight but full featured.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but full featured. Already had a regular TRX (several years old), but when our personal trainer got the TRX Go, we tried it out and love it for travel. Has a better door attachment. Like the half-way markers on the straps, and love that you can use just one strap for power pulls without having to thread the other handle thru the one you are using. Slightly less convenient to lengthen strap, but much less expensive. Strong enough for my 250-lb husband to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - (Coming from someone who has a lot of fitness experience)
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product. I fully intent to send back. THE STRAPS STOPPERS KEPT RELEASING MID-MOVEMENT. Can you appreciate how dangerous this is when you're in the middle of a rep trusting these straps with your safety?? 3-4 times this happened in a single workout (chest flys, where you basically fall flat on your face if the system doesnt hold up). I weigh 180lbs and have used TRX branded products before without a single issue. I dont know if I got a defective unit but is is NOT OK for the price charged....
customer_reviews.author: Vlad R

customer_reviews.title: I like them. A bit pricey for modified water ski ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them. A bit pricey for modified water ski straps. But I guess I’m just mad I didn’t think of it. Bought a heavy duty wall anchor, and am doing the basic excersise on the included wal chart. I haven’t tried any of the ones on the online videos. Taking off a star due to the night price point, and the fact that there is a monthly subscription fee for use of the app. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: ScriffyNerfHerder

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier just because it over delivered the general idea of ...
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier just because it over delivered the general idea of how helpful this item would be for me since I'm totally out of shape and it becomes handy specially for workouts I wouldn't be able to do without it building confidence little by little I love the fact that there are tons of different types of workouts depending on your level as far as experience and shape as a beginner I just have a question.... Please see image .... I want to know the differences of this 2.... Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Cheapened quality marketed as more portable
customer_reviews.text: I've use TRX straps for approx 10 yr. One of my two systems just broke down so I decided to try this on the GO system(sale on prime days). When I bought my first TRX it was marketed as a go anywhere system this Go unit just seems like a cheap version of a great product that is already completely go anywhere ready. Like I said I got 10 years out of my first TRX, I just don't see this one lasting 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: John Kafoury

customer_reviews.title: After using the professional version of TRX at the therapists ...
customer_reviews.text: After using the professional version of TRX at the therapists, the straps on the travel version would not stay in place when you tried to work with them in a shortened position.
customer_reviews.author: J. Seigler

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with registration card inside of it - box had been opened and resealed with the registration card removed. No ability without making a separate purchase to get access to online and mobile content.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it will work as well as the other TRX systems that I’ve used in the past, but it is missing the card to access the training app. I will return it and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Strap anchors slip
customer_reviews.text: I have the TRX Home and I decided to purchase TRX GO for traveling. I have never experienced any slippage with the TRX Home, but with TRX GO, slippage is a regularity. Even though I like and use TRX, I do not recommend this specific product.
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: padded handles  no wall mounts included
customer_reviews.text: TRX is amazing for all people engaged in all levels of fitness. I will be purchasing this product again but the model with the rubber handles and the adjustable foot straps which is an improvement from the padded handles and the unstable foot straps. Please note no wall mounts are included with this model. I can get an abs workout by doing upright planks which is a plus and workout anywhere even in my office during the day before I get home to prep for the next day. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product, however it looks like when using the door anchor it starts to fray the cord. I only used mine about 4 times and started noticing wear. I contacted the seller, who told me it was just dirty. I won't be buying the TRX again when I can get a knockoff for about half the price and last just as long. (Bought an off brand at WalMart for $20, and it works just as good as the TRX)
customer_reviews.author: Petite Pomme De Terre

customer_reviews.title: My TRX strap mount broke after less then 6 months of light use. Beware: this is very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, until the wall mount strap broke during a workout. I could have got hurt badly, but my fall was broken when my head hit the weight bench behind me. I reached out to TRX twice, once on their complaint system and once by hand delivered letter to TRX headquarters, and I got no response. I am concerned that people could get seriously injured. The specific item that broke during a workout was the strap attached to the TRX wall mount, but if that could break and TRX will not acknowledge the problem, what does that say about the safety of the entire TRX system? It says Warning: Danger.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy & Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box and it just looked extremely flimsy & unstable and wouldn't hook onto my door properly. Also, it doesn't seem like it would work on double doors. It is also hard to determine if it had to be used on doors that only opened out (or in). I returned it without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: madaboutdvds

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the professional TRX I use at the gym
customer_reviews.text: When in Australia I train in Muay Thai and body conditioning. There was the first I used TRX professional cables. Loved the exercises my instructor gave me, so this time on my return to the US I bought the $99 pair for my home workout room where I hung them next to my kick bag with a large eye-screw in a 2x6 board attached to the rafters, straps connected with the clip provided. My workout is the same as in the gym, and the feel of the grip and changing the length is the same. Here I train in a Muay Thai class only and use my TRX at home for conditioning. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Persistent Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let the torture begin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, it arrived like 2 WEEKS before they said. Talk about under promise and over deliver! I was pleased. The product itself is pretty much the same torture device that my trainer had me use at 24-hour fitness, only this one's mobile! With a door anchor! So now, if I EVER am allowed to travel (like, on a plane and staying in a hotel - do we even remember what that was like before covid-19? I can't recall) I can throw this in the suitcase and get some torture in, on the go! Anyway, great product. Five Stars. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great workout equipment. High quality material with scientific design. Safely and effectivley work every muscle in your body. Simple and easy to learn. Control resistance with foot position. Allows for very efficient way to perform warm up set, hard working sets, then you can adjust feet to get final reps. TRX website has many great workout instructions and complete workout programs. I now do TRX only workouts and weightlifting workouts that include some TRX exercises. I will use them when I travel. I am 100% satisfied with my decision to buy TRX.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Versatile workout - these are just like the TRX in gym!
customer_reviews.text: I use TRX at gym and bought these for home and travel. This system provides real versatility and is a staple of my work outs. Not only can you do upper body work, but even use them for your feet for planks. They fit into a bag and are lightweight. Just need to be careful that you attach to a door that is blocked by the doorframe so it doesn’t open towards you for safety. Shipping was fast. Comes with easy to follow website workout programs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Auletta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  addition to my fitness routine
customer_reviews.text: This item is better than I anticipated. I had used it during a visit to a health spa and was sold. My local gym did not have a system set up permanently or trx classes. So I took one personal training session at the club. And then purchased the travel trx. It is so easy to set up -- no drilling necessary. It is light-weight - perfect for travel (no need to miss workout days). I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love my TRX -- love the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Based on my personal trainer's opinion, I decided to purchase the actual TRX suspension trainer vs. a knock off. I was very impressed with TRX's packaging and follow-up with videos and their warranty. Because of COVID-19, some of the knock-offs have spongey hand holds that can harbor bacteria. TRX has closed cell hand holds that repels bacteria. I'm very happy with my purchase and the TRX support system.
customer_reviews.author: Patagonia Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easily transportable. Gives you a great versital workout. I bring it to the gym and can work my whole body. Can also be used at home in a doorway. It’s nice because you can adjust the resistance or weight just by angling your body. You can adjust mid workout when you get fatigued. I have gotten nice definitely in my arms and have muscles I’ve never had before popping out. Is great for novice as well as seasoned athlete.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This might be a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Is this a knock off? I tried to register my product and the Serial number that came up with the QR code is not valid. The token does not work either.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job If you do the Workout
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trx set specifically for a trip to Isla Mujeres Mexico and have been using it daily. I have been attaching it to a hammock anchor in the front court of our room and it is easy to attach and adjust. It is sturdy and works wonderfully for the purpose intend. Gym on the go.
customer_reviews.author: DAN EASTMAN

customer_reviews.title: If you havent bought this, what are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: I take this with me all over the country. It rocks. I have a complete gym in my suitcase and all I need is a place to set it up. If you want to invest in yourself and your health, get this. And then pair it up with the app. If will keep your workouts fresh and new. Thank you TRX!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Saitta

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted
customer_reviews.text: Pros - arrived very quickly, condition is very good Cons - expensive
customer_reviews.author: Markk

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: I just heard about TRX and given the price, it was a very affordable piece of equipment to add to our gym. I absolutely love TRX! There is a learning curve with becoming comfortable with it but there are so many videos to help it was a quick process. It's very sturdy and comfortable to use. We started by using it on a door which was okay and will work if we take it when travelling but did mount it on the ceiling. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Must have mount point 6 to 8 feet off the ground.
customer_reviews.text: This is a go-to body weight exercise system. Well-made. Problem is to make sure you have a sturdy mount that’s 6 to 8 feet off the ground. Too short means you can’t use it because you’d be on the floor. Too tall...well, you’d have some wiggle room with adjustable straps, but at some point, it would be too high off the floor to use effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cam buckle slips
customer_reviews.text: One of the cam buckles slips. I sent two support emails to TRX and have not had a reply. This product can be dangerous if the non slip cam buckles slips. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Droid Charge User

customer_reviews.title: So amazing. Everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.text: I love this exercise system. It’s very small and easily transportable and way better than heavy home gym equipment. It works well to shut it in a door for anchoring. Very effective workouts and easy to change the intensity of your workout depending on how you use it. This and my yoga mat are the absolute best home gym system for me. The low impact on joints with these straps is also nice as I have hyper mobile joints that often get sore.
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: Straps slide... very unstable and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love the TRX GO. The quality felt great, I set it up and I was excited to get started. I began by doing a standard chest press and the adjustable straps just gave in and slide all the way down. I almost fell on my face. Very dangerous situation. Maybe I just got a bad unit, but I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Straps May Slip - Injury
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious of the build quality. A day after installation, one of the straps slipped while I was doing a forward chest exercise (I only weigh 155lbs). I fell to the ground and injured my shoulder. I was never able to keep the strap from slipping on the buckle unless it was as short as it could be...only then would it keep from slipping. Disappointing the build quality doesn't match the price tag for what amounts to some nylon, metal, and foam.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Piece missing! I am not sure yet if anything else is missing but the box was clearly opened and pilfered. I was also not able to register it even though I entered the correct number on the strap. (Obviously I didn’t have the card for the alternative registration approach. I haven’t tried to use it yet but I also see that it doesn’t come close to fittting in the carry bag when assembled by a normal human being instead of a machine. So far very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: DLBFSA

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: The TRX Go Suspension trainer is a superb but simple to use full body workout system. I am very satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to get fit. I am 64, and I am using it everyday and I am amazed at how fast I am progressing every day.
customer_reviews.author: CA BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Well made and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It’s hanging in our master bath dressing area and reminds me to use it as often as possible. So many exercises are possible, so you can customize your routine to suit you. It’s made well and appears to be extremely durable and is very comfortable to use. I highly recommend this to anyone wanting to build strength without having to deal with weights lying around.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my most favorite workout tools I own. I cannot tell you guys enough how much I've recommended it to people. I'm an avid workout fanatic and have needed a change as I was hitting a plateau. It's sturdy, adaptable, makes core, upper back, and leg curls harder than ever. I have seen huge change in my physique. Just finding challenging workouts that kick up the heart rate and continue to push me is difficult. I lost the little access card so I'm figuring out stuff from YouTube... That's the tough part. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best home/outdoor workout kits out there.
customer_reviews.text: I got this one as a gift for a friend while I have the tactical one both are great and have them for a while now. As long as you can make yourself use it it works great. Looks easy nut when you use it it will target muscles that you didn't even know they existed :)
customer_reviews.author: Filip

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I would use it
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because I do not feel I had any door in my home that is not close enough to a wall that I could use this. I do not have a tiny home either. Every door where I might use it was furniture or a wall. We area coming into winter so there is no way I could use it outside. Felt for me it just was not going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Simple and dynamic
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system because of its simplicity. I don’t have to take weights on and off or move anything. Cuts down on wasted time. I feel I get a great dynamic workout where I can focus on the workout itself. I’m a runner and cyclist so I like simplicity and this system fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lindroth

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in Love with suspension training when I had a gym membership. All I ever wanted to do was use the TRX suspension straps! Now I no longer have a gym membership, I have my very own TRX that I can take anywhere and everywhere. The very best quality and comes with a convienant mesh bag for easy carry.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Spore

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for to resume working out at home
customer_reviews.text: I am a female in my 60's and have worked with a personal trainer for over 10 years. When my gym closed due to the pandemic, my trainer started on-line sessions, and recommended the TRX. I was set up at home in seconds and resumed training with his coaching. I have used the TRX before, but now that it is the only piece of equipment that I am using, I find that it is all that I need. The 50 minute sessions are challenging, and have built in cardio. since the TRX is so versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Provencher

customer_reviews.title: So versatile and challenging for many levels of ability!
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical education teacher by profession. I bought one of these for my students and one for my own use at home. I cannot say enough about the benefits of TRX. Muscular strength is something that has slowly decreased among my student population over the last several years. I love teaching my class a variety of approaches to fitness. I highly recommend TRX to anyone. It is portable, adaptable, challenging to many levels of ability, and easy to setup. There are many workouts available for free on YouTube and the box comes with a book of suggestions. You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Simple Exercise & Stretching Tool
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a simple and innovative way to use your own body weight in a work out, in your own home or when traveling! This is made of high quality material and comes with instructions and posters and accessories. Everyone should have one and make it part of their routine.
customer_reviews.author: D Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Great for at-home PT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TRX Go Trainer because of using one at physical therapy. I needed it for doing at-home PT. It's great to have an easy to use system. At home exercises and stretching are made much easier and I definitely need easy at this point due to my injury. I'll be using the TRX, even after recovery, for fitness exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Super when gymn closed!
customer_reviews.text: As described and seen. No stretch of course and works well over door best if door has lock amd opens out but i use on front door. Opens in but has lock and strong. Very good. All you need in one package. Handled very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: A full workout in a bag
customer_reviews.text: A must buy!! Especially since the gyms were closed. It will help me save money from going to the gym, it it will also help me stay in shape during this quarantine . I bought the hook for the ceiling and it’s a game changer. Here we are all using it.
customer_reviews.author: Adartse

customer_reviews.title: They do the job just fine. If you are a really fanatical TRX fan ...
customer_reviews.text: They do the job just fine. If you are a really fanatical TRX fan and want to change the length frequently, then spend the money for the professional level. These are find for me. I don't change the length during a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Magrogan

customer_reviews.title: Great to have one at home!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TRX at the gym, but, while gyms are closed for the pandemic I decided to order one for home. This version is a little less expensive that the basic model, but works the same. We ordered a bracket separately to install it on the wall in our sunroom. The TRX is so versatile! You can do so many types of exercises and its a great piece of equipment to have if you can't go to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Caesarea

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in an intact box with all parts included. It was very easy to install. I purchased a part separately to hang it from my ceiling and it is very sturdy. It is also easily possible for me to bring this with me traveling with the included travel mount. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: VermontHikerMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device, Awesomer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for both dynamic and isometric training. It's a perfect way to break out of a routine and work muscles from different angles. I had a question for the Customer Service folks who were fast, polite and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Northwesterner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool for core trainning
customer_reviews.text: Since I used one the trx in the gym I always wanted one. This pack has everthing to do a good routine and versatile on the go. I really love TRX and the trainning routines included in the app (12 months free)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: I started using TRX at the gym and really liked it - so decided to purchase one for my home. It came as expected. The installation kit was simple and very sturdy. I also like the chart that came with it describing the exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Beats TRX
customer_reviews.text: TRX is unbeatable.You can order look alikes but will not get the stable performance. I learned that...it doesn't wiggle or travel along your door jam;it forces the body to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra B. Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item has a gift for my sister, she loves it! Everything she could imagine and much more. Even if you just want to start small and workout at home before stepping foot into a gym, this is where you can start!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: A good value, because I use them.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding time for the gym, these straps are well built and give me a suitable workout whenever I can find even a few min. I have also found that because I do not have to change machines, add weight, etc. I can get through a workout very quickly which has lead me to work out more. They are not cheep but for me well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: happy boater 21

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE HOME/GARAGE
customer_reviews.text: Great for home use. We hung ours in the garage from one of the rafters. It's great for a quick hit when you don't have time to make it to the gym. The kids love swinging and getting their fitness on as well. Will probably bring and pack when I travel to have on-hand. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JACK HENRY

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to be able to work out at home. This works just as well as the one at the gym with all the convenience of being at home. Easy to use and very versatile. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: California Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I'm a personal trainer and I highly recommend the TRX if you're looking to step up your workouts. I've been using it in my home gym and I'm getting the "perfect sore!" It's excellent for beginning to advanced and so easy to tailor to your fitness level.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how excellent this product is! I can do a low-impact workout anywhere, even when traveling. Worth the price! Will order from this Seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Fraher

customer_reviews.title: I love the door anchor
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait for this to arrive so I could jump into a workout. I saw it in a gym near my home, but supported by ceiling anchors. I love the door anchor. Very pleased with the price, which is less than any other seller, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: H. D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. The only issue I've had is that all of my doorways have rather small areas in front of them so it was a little tricky to find a good spot to use, but that's nothing against the product! It's very sturdy and durable feelings and I have used them many times!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I am on Orange Theory Fitness NUT! These TRX straps are perfect for my home workout! I am so pleased with these. The over the door anchor is fantastic and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Why a small, thiner strap??
customer_reviews.text: I loved using the TRX strap in my gym and in Orange Theory. It is a wider and a bit thicker strap. The strap I received is thinner and I am concerned will not last as long. For a $130.00 you should have provided a better product. I may return it and purchase a less expensive strap. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Guru

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use at home or traveling
customer_reviews.text: TRX-GO is the same quality as the professional ones in my gym...but no one else has been able to make it hard to adjust the lengths. It is easy to use at home or traveling; the over the door attachment is very secure on any door, or it can be attached on playground equipment or any available pole. I have been a fan of TRX for years, and very happy to have my own to use whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: skigenie

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of experience with the TRX pro, but this version does not seem as sturdy or made at the same level of expected. It is still versitliel but I just dont feel secure on the specific trx go model.
customer_reviews.author: Arien & Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The baby bro of the TRX family
customer_reviews.text: This is the baby bro of the TRX brand and you can feel it. Compared to the diesel Pro version, this is definitely a little thinner. I can’t really do full pull-ups (I’m 190 lbs) without it giving a little and feeling a little wonky. Still, I can do mostly everything else just like the pro version, so as long as you’re not looking to suspend your full Body weight and just do strap supported work, this is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick dube

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: THis product is easy to use and set up. I highly reccomend getting the app and learning how to do the exercises for maximum benefit. It has been a life saver thru COVID.
customer_reviews.author: I’m a Driver

customer_reviews.title: No weight needed however if yours advanced enough you can get creative with kettlebells.
customer_reviews.text: I use the versatile connecting mount from my floating staircase to hang the TRX straps. It’s very stable and allows for safe, effective, fun workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moncrieffe

customer_reviews.title: TRX for home...no more gym for me!
customer_reviews.text: One thing COVID has taught me is that I don't meed a gym membership anymore. The TRX suspension system for home is just like the one at the gym. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Too pricy though.
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend you to buy this for your home gym. It’s a great attachment that come with an app to learn the exercises you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: None of your business

customer_reviews.title: My favorite work out equipment!
customer_reviews.text: My trainer at the gym uses this. I have a bad knee and hip and this allows me to do exercises I can’t normally do on my own ei...squats, lunges and many other things. There are so many exercises you do one this it’s hard to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Guilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great workout at home.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. This is great if you’ve been home bound due to the pandemic. It works very well. If I wore it out I’d buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: TR650

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic, I did get my hands on a handful of weights, kettle bells, and resistance bands, but this item offers a great alternative to mix the workouts up. I used to love using the TRX at the gym, but with COVID 19, it is comforting to be able to do some of the same workouts I had done in pre-COVID 19 times with this TRX. It is durable and effective for our weights. My partner and I both weigh around 140 lbs. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! While the order took a couple of weeks to arrive (due to high demand with gyms closed), it was worth the wait! Portable, sturdy, with a great app. to help with exercises. It also comes with instructional pictures and there are plenty of YouTube videos! I am a big guy and use this with a door in my house. Works great!!! Thanks TRX for making an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great product! But from their website.
customer_reviews.text: I love these straps. The gym that informed me I have scoliosis has a bunch of these straps, a heavier duty version of them but for home use I don’t think I could break these if I tried. Anyway... this covers all the physical therapy I need to heal my chronic pain and and ultimately train once I’ve retrained my body in a more basic degree. Easy to use. Just close any door. Grateful for this product. Amazon is unethical and has horrible customer service. My recommendation is to order directly from the merchant and cut out the middle hussler that’s taking over the world.
customer_reviews.author: Aya Wolfrik

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the previous set I owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of TRX band I have bought. The first set wore out but were much more robust than the ones I just purchased, The attaching hook is smaller and the bands themselves are thinner and probably won't last as long. As usual companies cheap out whenever they can
customer_reviews.author: john christie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I used to go to CrossFit gyms and use TRX all the time. During Covid this is a life saver! Get some good body weight workouts. I take my straps to work or just use them on the doors at home. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rjay

customer_reviews.title: Portable, easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Portable and light weight. Easy to use anywhere. This adds another dimension to at home workout possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: NC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stronger muscles for older women!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this. My son, who lives in Australia, told me about it. To keep working out but stay away from gyms! I have great workouts without leaving my house. I’m 66 years young so I have to be careful with this awful pandemic. Also strengthening muscles is very important for women in my age group.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it 3 to 4 days a week for just about any exercise, except legs... Great for an upper body / core workout. After 6 months of use it still looks brand new. I love it, and between this and resistance bands I have a full body workout in a sub 5 LBS pack
customer_reviews.author: Mater

customer_reviews.title: Great home or portable workout.
customer_reviews.text: Forget the gym. Forget weights. Perfect home workout during self-quarantine. I’ve already bought sets for friend to try to dissuade them from going to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: jethroTull

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Arm Stretch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to do push-ups, pull-ups, squats, etc., and to be able to keep my balance while doing them. The arm stretching is absolutely wonderful. You can adjust the intensity of your workout by taking a step back or forward. I am in my 60s and find this easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At 74 years old it's easy to work out with
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Quality as expected. At 74 years old it's easy to work out with. I kind of over did it the first time. Scaled back the reps and are doing better. Recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Papa

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment of exercises
customer_reviews.text: Straps are strong and weaving is of very good quality. The buckles are plastic which is different from other straps made by TRX which have metal buckles. Actually the straps are lighter and easier to handle and pack when traveling. They are fully registered straps on TRX website so they are OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers
customer_reviews.text: This system is awesome. The entire family is using the straps. Hung them from my rafters and getting a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Stanich

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: TRX is great! Really tough workout but uses muscles that other equipment cant reach. It's also a nice switch up from weight lifting and incorporates well into my workouts. I hung it from a steel structure beam in my basement and it works great. No damage to the house at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and versatility; it is a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use it as stand alone equipment or I can use it as an add on to my workouts with weights.
customer_reviews.author: Harry W Skene

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved Trx highly recommend this one really easy to pack up and go anywhere you want as Long as you got a place to hook it to
customer_reviews.author: William

product_meta.title: TRX GO Suspension Training: Bodyweight Fitness Resistance Training | Fitness for All Levels & All Goals for Total Body Workouts for Home & Travel | Lightweight & Portable | Workout Poster Included
feature_bullets: OUR LIGHTEST, MOST CONVENIENT TRAVEL TRAINER! TRX’s GO Suspension Trainer Kit helps you create intense full-body workouts Anytime, Anywhere! Includes Suspension Training Strap, Indoor/Outdoor Anchors, 2 Workout Guides, Training Poster & Mesh Bag—Download TRX App to Generate FREE Limitless Intensity!

INCREDIBLE RESULTS IN JUST 20 MINUTES! TRX gives you the power to hit fitness goals at home and on the go. Our digital workouts teach you EASY Core Strengthening Exercises that Build Muscle, Burn Fat, Increase Endurance & Improve Flexibility—making you Train, Look & Rapidly-Feel like a Powerful Professional Athlete NOW!

MOVEMENT-BASED TRAINING AT YOUR OWN PACE is TRX's Training Philosophy. Learn, Practice & Master 7 Simple Foundational Moves that everyone can do! Push, Pull, Plank, Squat, Lunge, Hinge & Rotate to Achieve Your Dream Body Fast! Then hit next-level intensity by creating limitless workout variations you CRUSH AT YOUR OWN PACE!

TRAIN EVERYWHERE! TRX anchors to any door, rafter, beam, tree, pole or post in seconds that supports 350 lbs. Weighing only one pound, our GO Suspension Trainer Kit travels Light & Fast—giving you freedom to Master Our Patented Suspension Training Method in the comfort of your home or even while traveling!
INCLUDES 6-MONTHS ACCESS TO TRX PREMIUM APP: Enjoy 6-Months of free access to the TRX premium app ($30 value) where you can explore over 1,000 workouts on your way to achieving your fitness goals.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
